rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with large windows to allow natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with an open dining area to provide a cohesive space for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A master bedroom with a spacious closet and an ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with enough space for a double bed and a small closet.

rooms.description: Another guest bedroom with space for a double bed and a small closet.

rooms.name: Common Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-ventilated bathroom with a toilet and shower.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A utility room for washing machines and additional storage.

rooms.name: Outdoor Lounge Area
rooms.description: An outdoor lounge area with seating and a fire pit for al fresco dining.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
